title: HRCSL calls for abolition of Prevention of Terrorism Act
content: The Human Rights Commission of Sri Lanka (HRCSL) has called for the abolition of the Prevention of Terrorism Act (PTA).This was conveyed through a statement issued on the briefing of the diplomats from 08th -10th of February on HRCSL’s Road Map for 2022 held at its headquarters.“Notwithstanding the amendments already suggested by the government, the HRCSL advocates the complete abolition of the PTA,” it read.
